modal.link: Why do I need to sign up?
modal.title: Why do I need to sign up?
list: Sign up is required to protect personal information. A strong password must follow requirements of Regulation 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data.
Registrations for tournaments are easier because you don't need to always fill in all your personal information.
You can receive a registration confirmation e-mail thanks to being signed up.
Communication between you and the organizers becomes way easier.
You are going to be able to view or modify registrations you have already submitted.
